Articles.Content: Idk, Browsing them in Mobile Browser just too hard.

That would be really useful. As much as I hate my phone with a violent passion, it's the only way I can get my forum fix when I'm unable to use my laptop, and the mobile forum browser is incredibly annoying.

21 hours ago, RealKerbal3x said:

That would be really useful. As much as I hate my phone with a violent passion, it's the only way I can get my forum fix when I'm unable to use my laptop, and the mobile forum browser is incredibly annoying.

yeah i know, it's incredibly annoying. Like i once try to read @DarkOwl57's Novel (I.E Life at the top), I literally have to click on each chapter if i'm done reading that chapter.
I know Tapatalk works with this engine, but I'm unsure if the settings are enabled for the KSP forums....
